title: Crockpot Sweet Potato & Black Bean Quinoa Chili
directions: Add all ingredients into a crock pot (starting with just 3 cups of broth). Turn on high and cook for 4 hours, turn down to low and continue to cook until ready to serve. If too thick, stir in another ½ – 1 cup of water.
Serve with diced avocado (or guac) and tortilla chips. It’s such a good combo!
ingredients: 3 cups diced sweet potato about 1 large
1 cup diced red onion about 1 medium
1 cup diced bell peppers about 1 large
1 28 oz can of fire roasted tomatoes
1/2 teaspoon cayenne more or less to taste
